A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Thin story. Even more so than what you'd expect in a journey to Star Wars book that precedes theses Disney movies. As a stand alone movie it would be okay but definitely doesn't work as a continuation of what Abrams did. Considering it's part 8 of a 9 part story it would be like if Rowling turned Harry Potter over someone to do what every they wanted with for book 6. With this movie Rian ruined the 9 part story in a way Lucas even didn't with Jar Jar\, bad acting\, and poor dialogue.
